title: MAHINDRA CITADEL
detail: Mahindra Citadel redefines urban living with its luxurious 2, 3, and 4 BHK residences. Located in a prime area, these homes are designed to offer a blend of comfort and style. Enjoy spacious interiors, high-end finishes, and modern amenities that cater to your every need. With features like expansive living areas, modular kitchens, and well-appointed bathrooms, Mahindra Citadel ensures a lifestyle of sophistication and convenience. Here, every detail is crafted to enhance your living experience, making it a perfect sanctuary in the heart of the city.
developer_detail: Founded in 1994, Mahindra Lifespace Developers Ltd. has applied the Mahindra Group's "Rise" philosophy to India's real estate sector. They have achieved this by establishing flourishing residential areas and supporting business environments. The company has developed over 35 million square feet of space across the country.pen_sparkcircleBengaluru, Karnataka, India  • Update location
city_description: Experience a thriving urban lifestyle in Pimpri-Chinchwad, a bustling hub in Pune's northwestern corridor. Renowned for its industrial prowess and rapid development, this vibrant city offers a plethora of opportunities for modern living. Explore a wide range of residential options, from affordable apartments to luxurious villas, catering to diverse needs and budgets. Enjoy easy access to renowned educational institutions, healthcare facilities, and entertainment destinations.
